content:
SubstanceNucleicAcid is missing from some tabs of the resource list (especially the alphabetical listing, which I use most often)

http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/resourcelist.html
http://build.fhir.org/resourcelist.html
Why would that resource be missing from the Alphabetical tab, but included on the Categorized tab? Is this a tooling issue?

No. Those pages are manually maintained. Looks like both the author and the QA process missed this. Can you submit a change request @Paul Denning? We might fix it in R4 if we do another technical correction.
